title: List of Dutch football transfers winter 2012–13
text:
This is a list of transfers in <a href="Netherlands">Dutch</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> for the 2012-13 Winter transfer window. Only moves featuring an <a href="Eredivisie">Eredivisie</a> side are listed.
The winter <a href="transfer%20window">transfer window</a> will open on January 1, 2013, and will close on January 31. Deals may be signed at any given moment in the season, but the actual transfer may only take place during the transfer window. Unattached players may sign at any moment.
